name: Handle_rain
xml: <xml xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml'><block type='ef_runevery' id='TStzo00S^JL(exLC(*^=' x='238' y='88'><field name='seconds'>60</field><statement name='TIME'><block type='controls_forEach' id='L:b,jQD[)!r!23E-gIZD'><field name='VAR'>shutter</field><value name='LIST'><block type='ef_shutter_list' id='sKeDet7Re`7DgB`#NZ!O'></block></value><statement name='DO'><block type='controls_if' id='GT:VugZBy~~_KnKx9_Ad'><value name='IF0'><block type='logic_compare' id='t}Mo.JFT(;JuZT}0f_6x'><field name='OP'>GTE</field><value name='A'><block type='ef_getcaptorvalue' id='Oan7GrS{33A7,kBHBiEG'><field name='variable'>humidity</field><value name='SHUTTER'><block type='variables_get' id='Jaj!kcUa_oJcpRt1k`p?'><field name='VAR'>shutter</field></block></value></block></value><value name='B'><block type='math_number' id='?ERgVecVT~#{Q6O0gRRd'><field name='NUM'>0.8</field></block></value></block></value><statement name='DO0'><block type='ef_close_shutter' id='mGhsLF#,6b5pFGOf{B^l'><value name='SHUTTER'><block type='variables_get' id=':{AdMjSo-pWZBX,KfTVt'><field name='VAR'>shutter</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></xml>
js: var shutter;Blockly.runEvery(function(60) {   var shutter_list = (EasyFlap.Shutters);  for (var shutter_index in shutter_list) {    shutter = shutter_list[shutter_index];    if ((EasyFlap.getCaptorValue(shutter, "humidity")) >= 0.8) {      EasyFlap.closeShutter(shutter);    }  }});
